column5: Hey Gents. Any tricks to opening a tiny splitring to replace a hook. Â  Before I go insane trying. Peter
LOL, Peter those aren't the tiny ones, I am guessing size 2 or 3. A pair of split ring pliers works best, but if you can pry it with an old butter knife
Split ring pliers
Stick another gook into the split ring to open it up.Â  Â  Split ring pliers will be the best idea by far though.

Shimano makes very good split ring pliers. They are offset so you can see little better. Now the process! You open the split ring and slide old hook into gap move it a little then slide new hook in beside old hook. Run the old/new hook around split ring , old hook is off new hook on.
Thanks for that. But the ring is tiny. Tried and tried. Maybe should get a bigger ring.
